title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.tldr: Tracking cookies will be used if you accept the tracking cookies function before accessing the websites https://www.inrupt.com and https://www.solid.inrupt.com, but the websites will continue to function even if you do not give permission to the tracking cookies.
tosdr.case: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

quoteText:
Tracking cookies will be used if you accept the tracking cookies function before accessing the websites https://www.inrupt.com and https://www.solid.inrupt.com, but the websites will continue to function even if you do not give permission to the tracking cookies.

When you browse on the website https://inrupt.net, there are no tracking cookies, only a functional cookie that temporarily stores your WebID on inrupt servers if and when you are logged in so that you stay logged in.
